data.name: Silver Creek Falls - Chapter 2 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The “Silver Creek Falls: Chapter 2” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Follow Sara’s return to this enigmatic case with these deep and ambient compositions.


01 - A Lonely Town
02 - Old School Funk
03 - Late City Night
04 - Memento For Strings
05 - No Man's Land
06 - A Strange Peace
07 - A Lost Piano
08 - Hazard
09 - Mist
10 - A Call to Action
11 - Home Safe
12 - Truth and Justice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card capable of playing MP3s
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card capable of playing MP3s
